topic.title: Spinal Cord Medical Centers Visted - conformance rules

section.p: This is the class that contains the current and historic medical centers that provided services for the veteran

ol.li:
Contains at least one [1..*] medicalCentersVisted with data type Code
Contains code set that provides a list of the VAMC visted by the veteran.
